Title: Technological innovation makes red flowers blossom
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: A textile worker on a cart on rails, operating the machines. The four women behind her appear to be checking the efficiency of this innovation.The text on the aprons:抓革命促生产 - Grasp revolution, increase production.The slogans in the background:破除资产阶级法权思想 - Destroy the Ideology of the Bourgeois Right (a phrase coined by Zhang Chunqiao, one of the Gang of Four).认真学习马克思主义巩固无产阶级专政 - Earnestly study Marxism to strengthen the dictatorship of the proletariat.エ业学大庆 - In industry, learn from Daqing.独立自主自力更生 - Self-determination, self-reliance.
